pages.title: Phase 5 - Mockery
pages.text: The Watcher imitates you: mirrored footsteps, copied mining rhythms, and distorted versions of familiar spaces. Stop using predictable loops. Change mining cadence and vary your approach vectors.

pages.title: Phase 6 - Confrontation
pages.text: Manifestation risk is high. Keep distance, avoid tunnel entrapment, and preserve stamina for repositioning. If it appears, prioritize line-of-sight control and immediate relocation rather than pursuit.

pages.title: Phase 7 - Unraveling
pages.text: Reality faults can invalidate terrain assumptions and movement plans. Travel light, keep duplicate gear cached off-site, and be ready to abandon the world if infrastructure becomes unreliable.
